commentBody: Ali vs. Foreman (1974, The Rumble in the Jungle).  Experts believed that Foreman might literally kill the 32-year old Ali, and Forman pretty much admits that was his plan.  But Ali could take a punch, and his rope-a-dope strategy wore Foreman down.  Ali knocked him out in the 8th round.  Both Foreman and the boxing world were in disbelief.
